title: The Emeril Lagasse Show
overview: Chef Emeril Lagasse, with the help of acclaimed bandleader Dave Koz and The Kozmos house band, shares his world, his friends and his passion for food with the studio and home audience. Each week, viewers are welcomed into an evening of food, entertainment, music and fun and games as Emeril gives new meaning to the term, "let the good times roll." Audience members have opportunities to cook on stage and play games to win the weekly prize in The Big Bam Box.
